fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART FAVORS
fields.Description: "You seem to be very helpful, I got a favour to ask."

fields.Title: START
input
Evrart Claire: "He gives you a quizzical look, then..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He gives you a quizzical look, then smiles pleasantly. "Don't take this question personally, but *why* would I get involved in this matter, Harry?"

fields.Title: You: ""The brew! The shady, shady brew.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The brew! The shady, shady brew."

fields.Title: You: ""The belt the man was hanged with i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The belt the man was hanged with incriminates the Union. At least you could help us out a bit."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["yard.hanged_electrochem_vermillion_belt"] == true   or  Variable["yard.hanged_encyclo_cargo_belt_airships"] == true  or  Variable["TASK.cut_the_belt"] == true

fields.Title: You: ""Also, I studied the footprints at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Also, I studied the footprints at the crime scene. Worker boots."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""I don't know what that means, Harr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know what that means, Harry. Shady brew? There are so many moving parts in my operation I can't keep track of them all..."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh my..." He smiles pleasantly. "D..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh my..." He smiles pleasantly. "Don't take this question personally, but *why* would I get involved in this matter?"

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, how could I forget your little..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, how could I forget your little side-project! Well done, Harry. Well done! Don't even tell me what it was. But good job! I love it when workers take the initiative like this."

fields.Title: Drama: "He sincerely has no idea what you w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He sincerely has no idea what you were talking about -- and he doesn't care either.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""You can find Jean-Luc down at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You can find Jean-Luc down at the gates." He turns back to you. "He's the big, impressive one. You know: tattoos, muscles -- ethnic looking. Can't miss him. Great guy."
fields.Alternate1: "You can find Jean-Luc down at the gates, but..." He smirks. "... you already knew that. Anyway, he's going to help you."
fields.Alternate2: He turns back to you: "You can find Luc down at the gates, but..." He smirks. "You already knew that. Anyway, he's going to help you -- now that he's back on his feet."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mr. Claire. The man was hanged wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mr. Claire. The man was hanged with a cargo belt. A steel reinforced cargo belt. It's safe to assume the Union had *something* to do with the murder."
fields.Alternate1: "Mr. Claire. The man was hanged with a cargo belt. A steel reinforced cargo belt, like the ones you have lying around here. With 'VERMILLION' on the side. It's safe to assume you had *something* to do with the murder."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""What?" The big man looks at you su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?" The big man looks at you surprised.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""I can certainly see how having him..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can certainly see how having him up there might start affecting *some* real estate values." He licks his fat lips and smiles.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Besides, getting the body down wou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Besides, getting the body down would benefit all of us. It's a stain on the neighbourhood."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You might have noticed there's one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You might have noticed there's one hanging on a tree behind the hostel-cafeteria."

fields.Title: notkimstuff
Evrart Claire: ""Jean-Luc, my boy. I'm sending a po..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jean-Luc, my boy. I'm sending a police officer down. He has a dead-body-in-a-tree problem he needs help with. Namely, he needs it to be taken *down*."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""And, Jean... please take it easy w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And, Jean... please take it easy with the race science. That's a *yes* to getting the body down, *no* to the race science." He hangs up and turns back to you.
fields.Alternate1: "And. Jean... please take it easy with the race science. He's had enough of that." He hangs up and turns back to you.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""You know what? Don't even tell me...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know what? Don't even tell me. Whatever it is -- do it. Surprise me!" He reconsiders. "Just one thing... if you can, make it even *shadier*."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "So do I. That's one tasty brew, you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So do I. That's one tasty brew, you should drink some right now if you can!

fields.Title: You: ""The shady brew. You told me to mak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The shady brew. You told me to make it even shadier. I didn't. It had alcohol in it. Now there's no alcohol."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Don't even tell me what was going..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't even tell me what was going on. Alcoholic brew, stronger, stopped it, strike. I'm just gonna let you surprise me, Harry."

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
You: ""Footprints left at the crime scene..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Footprints left at the crime scene point to someone wearing a worker's boot. Possibly a dockworker."

fields.Title: You: ""You are a community leader, help y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You are a community leader, help your community out!"

fields.Title: Variable["gates.mhead_fight_success"]
Variable["gates.mhead_fight_success"]
!(Variable["gates.mhead_fight_success"])
Evrart Claire: ""But of course, all joking aside, I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But of course, all joking aside, I *am* going to help you." He picks up the handset of a radio-phone to his right -- then clicks a button.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Jean-Luc, the cop who bested you i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jean-Luc, the cop who bested you in physical combat is here and he has a little dead-body-in-a-tree problem. Namely, he needs it to be taken down. Please extend him this courtesy."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""What?" The big man looks at you, c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?" The big man looks at you, confused.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, the belt thing!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, the belt thing!"

fields.Title: You: ""You seem to be the community leade..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You seem to be the community leader -- do this for your community."

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Jump to: [EVRARTHUB]
Evrart Claire: ""Did I? Well done then, Harry. I li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did I? Well done then, Harry. I like not knowing about it and I'm sure you made the right call. I spend the whole day delegating tasks, and it's a great relief to see people taking initiative."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""I don't even want to know what all..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't even want to know what all of that means -- brew, shady, alcohol, turned off. I'm gonna let the world *surprise* me."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Jean-Luc, my boy. I'm sending two..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jean-Luc, my boy. I'm sending two police officers down. They have a dead-body-in-a-tree problem they need help with. Namely, they need it to be taken *down*."

fields.Title: Jump to: [EVRARTHUB]
Jump to: [EVRARTHUB]
Evrart Claire: ""I don't know what that means, Harr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know what that means, Harry. But I love it!" He chuckles. "I love your initiative! Knowing you're out there keeping things running lets me focus on the big picture stuff."

fields.Title: Variable["yard.hanged_electrochem_vermillion_belt"]   or  Variable["yard.hanged_encyclo_cargo_belt_airships"]  or  Variable["yard.hangedman_saw_the_belt"]
Variable["yard.hanged_electrochem_vermillion_belt"]   or  Variable["yard.hanged_encyclo_cargo_belt_airships"]  or  Variable["yard.hangedman_saw_the_belt"]
!(Variable["yard.hanged_electrochem_vermillion_belt"]   or  Variable["yard.hanged_encyclo_cargo_belt_airships"]  or  Variable["yard.hangedman_saw_the_belt"])
